PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 41-44 However , simple incorporation of the thieno- [3,4-b]thiophene units might increase the highest occupied molecular orbital ( HOMO ) level of polymers , which causes a significant loss of open - circuit voltages in PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

1. "thieno- [3,4-b]thiophene units" - This is a compound or chemical entity, but it can also be considered a "Property Name" entity since it refers to a specific structural property that can affect the electrical properties of polymers.
2. "highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO)" - This is a property name in the field of chemistry and physics, specifically in quantum mechanics. It refers to the energy level of the highest occupied electron orbital in a molecule.
3. "open-circuit voltages in PSCs" - This is a property name in the field of photovoltaics, specifically in the study of perovskite solar cells (PSCs). It refers to the maximum voltage that can be generated by the solar cell under open-circuit conditions.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. "thieno- [3,4-b]thiophene units" - This is a material property since it refers to a specific structural property of a material that can affect its electrical properties.
2. "highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO)" - This is a material property since it refers to an energy level property of a material's electronic structure.
3. "open-circuit voltages in PSCs" - This is a material property since it refers to a performance property of a specific type of material (perovskite solar cells) under open-circuit conditions.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
